trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Tifton
There were no other sightings in Tifton on or around February 4th 2013
Summary: A BRIGHT LIGHT BLINDING...in front of the sun in a long line like sphere
divs: Sighting DetailsSo apparently I was not the only one who saw this yesterday, lost time head crap that was not right and saw a light so blinding that it made the sun look like it was a flashlight in comparison. In fact Dawn French of French and Saunders saw it...they now stated the Super Bowl, was on another grid, when the lights went out..I was exactly in Ga-Fl when this happened, I pulled over called my brother, crying..He said he never got the message just static, I lost time, my car was filthy dirty from going through all the snow, and Ice, This morning I woke up told John, called my brother i told him there where handprints all over the car, i went down to take pictures and I swear someone f ing washed my car overnight...its in a parked garage and its a black town car, you cant clean white ice salt off of it...My phone went from 80% power to 13% power in 5 minutes while I was watching this light in the sky, it then just went away. I don't care how many friends I loose over this, how many people think im nuts...I KNOW WHAT I HEARD AND SAW...I KNOW somethings not right..I called my brother on EST on my phone and it does not match up to when this happened...I pulled into a rest stop right after and NO one was there..I went inside it was light i went to the bathroom and came out and it was night...I was in there for like 2 minutes...IM only saying this because im not bloody crazy and this is eating me up....ThIS IS WHAT I SAW IN THE MIDDLE OF NO WHERE.......
